name: Tanker_Melee.Dual_Blades
display_help: You are a master of fighting with a blade in each hand. Your precision and skill with the blades enable you to strike in numerous combinations, each of which has unique secondary effects on a target which withstands your onslaught.

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Dual_Blades.Light_Opening
powers.display_help: A quick swipe with your blades. Does minor lethal damage, but has a quick recharge rate. This attack begins both the Empower and Weaken combination attacks. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Very Fast

display_info: 2 ticks of 22.19 lethal damage over 0.5s on target after 0.13s delay
2 ticks of 35.00 lethal damage over 0.5s on target after 0.13s delay
2 ticks of 9.98 fire damage over 0.5s on target after 0.13s delay
Only using Fiery Embrace

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Dual_Blades.Moderate_Opening
powers.display_help: You perform a deadly Strike with your blades. This is a basic attack that deals a moderate amount of lethal damage. This power is needed for the Sweep combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 3 ticks of 20.43 lethal damage over 1s on target
3 ticks of 29.68 lethal damage over 1s on target
3 ticks of 9.19 fire damage over 1s on target
Only using Fiery Embrace

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Dual_Blades.Moderate_Bridge
powers.display_help: You Slash at your foe with your blades, dealing a good amount of lethal damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This power is needed for the Empower and Weaken combination attacks, and is the beginning of the Attack Vitals combination attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: 2 ticks of 34.87 lethal damage over 0.6s on target after 0.13s delay
-7.00% strength to defense for 10s on target
2 ticks of 38.39 lethal damage over 0.6s on target after 0.13s delay
2 ticks of 15.69 fire damage over 0.6s on target after 0.13s delay
Only using Fiery Embrace

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Dual_Blades.Taunt
powers.display_help: Taunts a foe, and some nearby foes, to attack you. Useful for pulling villains off an ally who find themselves in over their head. Taunted foes tend to ignore other Heroes and focus on you for quite a while, so use this power cautiously. A To Hit check is required to Taunt enemy players, but is not needed against critter targets. Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 4.0 taunt for 41s on target
4.0 taunt for 10.25s on target
-100.00% strength to range for 20s on target
Ignores buffs and enhancements

powers.name: Tanker_Melee.Dual_Blades.AoE_Bridge
powers.display_help: You spin around in a circle, attacking everyone within melee range with a striking attack. This attack is the finishing move in both the Weaken and Sweep combination attacks. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

powers.display_help: You perform a feint attack that deals light damage. After this attack hits, it gives you a large bonus to To Hit and damage for a brief time. This power is the finishing move in the Empower combination attack. Damage: Light, Recharge: Slow
